Russian Figure Supports Call of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Russian Figure Supports Call of Swiss Organization 
   Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- N. I. Pereslavchev, secretary general of the Russian Maritime Territorial Association for Friendship with the DPRK, made public a statement in support of the call of the Swiss Preparatory Committee for the Commemoration of the Day of the Sun (birthday of President Kim Il Sung) and February 16 (birthday of Kim Jong Il) for grandly commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2007 as a common holiday of progressive humankind.
 He declared that his association would extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and positively cooperate with the DPRK in developing the bilateral relations in all fields in the future, too.    
 Expressing full support to the joint call of the Swiss body for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2007 as a common holiday of progressive humankind in grand style and visiting Kim Jong Il's old home in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu, he underscored the need to include colorful events in the association's program for 2007 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and February 16.

Philippine Ambassador Presents Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Philippine Ambassador Presents Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
   Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Sonia Cataumber Brady, Philippine ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
 On hand was Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and members of Philippine embassy.    
 Kim Yong Nam conversed with the ambassador after receiving his credentials.

DPRK-Vietnam Inter-Governmental Cooperation Committee Meets
articles.content:
DPRK-Vietnam Inter-Governmental Cooperation Committee Meets
   Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 6th meeting of the DPRK- Vietnam Inter-Governmental Committee for Economic and Scientific and Technological Cooperation was held in Pyongyang on August 29.
 Present there were members of a DPRK government economic delegation headed by Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and members of a Vietnamese government economic delegation led by Phan The Rue, permanent vice-minister of Trade, and Phan Trong Thai, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK.    
 The meeting discussed the issues of boosting the economic and scientific and technological cooperation and developing trade between the two countries.

articles.title: Delegation of State Academy of Sciences Leaves for Brazil
articles.content:
Delegation of State Academy of Sciences Leaves for Brazil
   Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences led by President Pyon Yong Rip left here Tuesday to participate in the 10th General Conference of Academy of Sciences for the Developing World and the meeting of ministers of science and technology of G-77 to be held in Brazil.
